title: Make the innie build more efficient.
description:
Hash the content of all the files in the embedded file system.
  Before we build the innie image, check to see if there is an existing image with the tag `giverny-innie:latest`.
    If there is an existing image check it's metadata to see if the image has a label of `com.github.hughe.giverny.source-hash` that is equal to the hash.  If it does, then we can skip the `docker build`.  The image is uptodate.
    If it does not have a matching label, then embed the hash in the dockerfile and build it.
